original_text: The two angels arrived at Sodom. It was evening and Lot was sitting near the city gate. When Lot saw the angels, he got up to meet them. He turned his face towards the ground to respect them.
korean_text: 저녁 때에 그 두 천사가 소돔에 이르니 마침 롯이 소돔 성문에 앉아 있다가 그들을 보고 일어나 영접하고 땅에 엎드려 절하며

sentences.original_text: The two angels arrived at Sodom.
and Lot was sitting near the city gate.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 롯이 성문 근처에 앉아 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: he got up to meet them.
He turned his face towards the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 얼굴을 땅을 향해 돌렸습니다.
